name: strand-collection
description: A simple collection wrapper component useful for 2 way binding to lists of data

attributes.name: data
attributes.description: The array that this collection stores its data in

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new MM-Model instance and appends it to the collection data

arguments.name: init
arguments.description: The data to insert into the model

arguments.name: silent
arguments.description: If true the collection will not fire an event when the new model is added.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds an existing MM-Model instance to the collection.

arguments.name: model
arguments.description: MM-Model reference to add to collection.

arguments.name: silent
arguments.description: If true the collection will not fire an event when the new model is added.

arguments.name: force
arguments.description: If true the collection will skip model verification and append to the data array without checking for duplicates.

methods.name: getModelAt
methods.description: Retreieves a model by niave index

arguments.name: index
arguments.description: The index of the model to retreive

methods.name: getDataAt
methods.description: Retrieves the data for a model at a niave index

arguments.name: index
arguments.description: The index of the model from which to obtain data

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a model from the collection

arguments.name: model
arguments.description: May be either an MM-Model object or a niave index to a model in the collection that you wish to delete. Client side deletion only.

arguments.name: silent
arguments.description: If true a changed event is not dispatched from the collection when it is emptied

arguments.name: silent
arguments.description: If true a changed event is not dispatched from the collection when it is emptied

methods.name: save
methods.description: An alias method to post() in the adapter

methods.name: update
methods.description: An alias method to put() in the adapter

methods.name: fetch
methods.description: An alias method to get() in the adapter

methods.name: destroy
methods.description: An alias method to delete() in the adapter

methods.name: each
methods.description: ala forEach in an array, calls the callback for each model in the array and passes it the model

arguments.name: callback
arguments.description: The callback to call for each model. This behaves identically to instance.data.forEach

methods.name: where
methods.description: Return a filtered set of collections based on a matching object. If the 2nd param is true the values in this object must also match.

arguments.name: obj
arguments.description: The matching Object to filter the collection by

arguments.name: matchValues
arguments.description: When matchValues is false, the filter will return any models that have the same keys as the matching object. When true the values will be considered as well when filtering.
